email/emailvalidated/your_email_has_been: Your Email has been been activated successfully. Please login to proceed
email/emailvalidated/we_have_failed_to_a: Email activation failed. Maybe you have activated your email already.  In any case, you can login. If you are not activated you will be directed to a page where you can request for a new activation link to be sent to you by email.
email/forgotpassword/you_will_be_sent_an: Enter your email address below and we will send you an email with instructions to reset your password.
email/forgotpassword/activation_email_se: An email has been sent with instructions to reset your password.
email/forgotpassword/error_cannot_find_e: Error: Cannot find your account details. Please recheck your email and try again.
email/resetforgottenpassword/password_ha: Password has been reset successfully. You can login using your new password now.
email/resetforgottenpassword/something_w: Something went wrong. Could not reset password
email/resetforgottenpassword/the_link_ha: The link has already been used
email/resetforgottenpassword/link_is_inv: Your password has already been reset.  If you want to change your password again please click 'Log  In' and then click on the 'Forgotten Credentials' button.  You will be sent another email to reset your password.
email/validateemail/you_have_an_account_: You have an account but your email has not been validated.
email/validateemail/you_should_have_rece: You should have received an email entitled:
email/validateemail/inside_the_email_the: Inside the email there is a link to click to activate your account.
email/validateemail/please_click_on_link: Please click on the link or copy and paste the link into a browser.
email/validateemail/if_you_cannot_find_t: If you cannot find the email, please check your Email Spam folder.
email/validateemail/if_you_still_cannot_: If you still cannot find the email, click the 'Resend activation email' button.
email/validateemail/an_activation_email_: An activation email has been sent to {{email}}. If you don't receive the email, login and you will have the opportunity to send the activation email again.
Something went wrong failed to send. Re-activation email
error/token_expired: Sorry, you're token has expired. Please login to get a new token
error/please_copy_error_into_email_and_s: Please copy the error in the pink box into an email and send it to:
error/sorry_an_error_has_occured_request: Sorry, an error has occured, Requested page not found!
error/sorry_you_appear_to_be_offline_che: Sorry, unable to proceed. You appear to be offline. Please check your internet connection.
generic/sorry_looks_like_you_have_been_l: Sorry, Looks like you have been logged out
login/permission/missing: You don't have the right permissions to access this area
login/permission/login: Sorry, You must be logged in.
login/you_do_not_have_permission_to_acce: You don't have permissions to access this domain
